NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
OFFICE OF
THE REGIONAL DIRECTOR
2500 Municipal Building
New York 7, New York
May 13, 1954
Mr. Frank Schooley
Treasurer, NAEB
Station WILL
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Frank:
I am transmitting herewith a check in the sum of $415. 39 for
the account of the WNYC Educational Institute of the Air. I
believe that this will defray all existing obligations and, at the
same time, more than provide the 4% administration charge
for the entire grant.
Mr. Bernays informs me that "should there eventually turn out
to be any other expenses, we would, of course, be glad to take
care of them when they turn up, in line with our understanding. "
I presume that it would be possible to obtain from you an accounting
according to your records of all of the expenditures so that a reÂ¬
port can be made to the Bernays Foundation.
With all best wishes, believe me,
sns/be
enc.
